trans-unit.resname: C18·1 | Boreas Charger | Card Name
C18·1 | Boreas Charger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·1 | Boreas Charger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference, reveal those cards, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，选择一位操控之地比你多的对手。从你牌库中搜寻等同于该差距数量的平原牌并展示这些牌。将其中一张横置放进战场，其余的牌则置于你手上。然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: C18·2 | Empyrial Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·3 | Heavenly Blademaster | Card Name
C18·3 | Heavenly Blademaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·3 | Heavenly Blademaster | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may attach any number of Auras and Equipment you control to it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将任意数量由你操控的灵气和武具贴附于其上。

trans-unit.resname: C18·3 | Heavenly Blademaster | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME上每贴附一个灵气和武具，由你操控的其他生物便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: C18·4 | Loyal Unicorn | Card Name
C18·4 | Loyal Unicorn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·4 | Loyal Unicorn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn. Other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则于本回合中，防止将对由你操控之生物造成的所有伤害。由你操控的其他生物获得警戒异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: C18·5 | Magus of the Balance | Card Name
C18·5 | Magus of the Balance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.
trans-unit.target: {4}{W}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：每位牌手各选择若干由其操控的地，其数量等同于所有牌手中操控地最少之牌手的地数量，然后牺牲其余的地。牌手也以此法弃牌与牺牲生物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·6 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Name
C18·6 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, for each nonland card type, you may cast a spell of that type from among the exiled cards without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的八张牌。你可以将其中一张地牌放进战场。直到回合结束，对每种非地之牌张类别而言，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放一个该类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: C18·7 | Echo Storm | Card Name
C18·7 | Echo Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. You may choose new targets for the copies.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，你本盘游戏中每从统帅区施放过一次你的指挥官，便将此咒语复制一次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: C18·7 | Echo Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标神器之复制品。

trans-unit.resname: C18·8 | Estrid's Invocation | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·9 | Ever-Watching Threshold | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·10 | Loyal Drake | Card Name
C18·10 | Loyal Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·10 | Loyal Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C18·11 | Octopus Umbra | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·12 | Primordial Mist | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·13 | Vedalken Humiliator | Card Name
C18·13 | Vedalken Humiliator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — Whenever CARDNAME attacks, if you control three or more artifacts, creatures your opponents control lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 金技～每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你操控三个或更多神器，则直到回合结束，由对手操控的生物失去所有异能且基础力量与防御力为1/1。

trans-unit.resname: C18·14 | Bloodtracker | Card Name
C18·14 | Bloodtracker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·14 | Bloodtracker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {B}，支付2点生命：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·14 | Bloodtracker | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，其上每有一个+1/+1指示物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C18·15 | Entreat the Dead | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·16 | Loyal Subordinate | Card Name
C18·16 | Loyal Subordinate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: C18·16 | Loyal Subordinate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, each opponent loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则每位对手各失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: C18·18 | Skull Storm | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: C18·19 | Sower of Discord | Card Name
C18·19 | Sower of Discord | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·19 | Sower of Discord | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose two players.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择两位牌手。

trans-unit.resname: C18·19 | Sower of Discord | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever damage is dealt to one of the chosen players, the other chosen player also loses that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当所选牌手其中一位受到伤害时，另一位也失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: C18·20 | Emissary of Grudges | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·22 | Fury Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·23 | Loyal Apprentice | Card Name
C18·23 | Loyal Apprentice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·23 | Loyal Apprentice | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。该衍生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: C18·24 | Nesting Dragon | Card Name
C18·24 | Nesting Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 0/2 red Dragon Egg creature token with defender and "When this creature dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and '{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.'"
trans-unit.target: 飞行地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个/2红色龙／蛋衍生生物，且具有守军与「当此生物死去时，派出一个2/2红色的龙衍生生物，且具有飞行与『{R}：此生物得+1/+直到回合结束。』」

trans-unit.resname: C18·25 | Reality Scramble | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·26 | Saheeli's Directive | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·27 | Treasure Nabber | Card Name
C18·27 | Treasure Nabber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent taps an artifact for mana, gain control of that artifact until the end of your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手横置一个神器以产生法术力时，你获得该神器的操控权直到你下一个回合的回合结束。

C18·29 | Crash of Rhino Beetles | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·29 | Crash of Rhino Beetles | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +10/+10 as long as you control ten or more lands.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控十个或更多地，CARDNAME便得+10/+10。

trans-unit.resname: C18·30 | Genesis Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·31 | Loyal Guardian | Card Name
C18·31 | Loyal Guardian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·31 | Loyal Guardian | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则在每个由你操控的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·35 | Turntimber Sower | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: C18·35 | Turntimber Sower | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.\n{G}, Sacrifice three creatures: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张地牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场时，派出一个/1绿色植物衍生生物。{G}，牺牲三个生物：将目标地牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
trans-unit.note: 官方翻译于OTC（2024-04-19）；非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: C18·36 | Whiptongue Hydra | Card Name
C18·36 | Whiptongue Hydra | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·36 | Whiptongue Hydra | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy all creatures with flying. Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each creature destroyed this way.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭所有具飞行异能的生物。每以此法消灭一个生物，便在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·37 | Aminatou, the Fateshifter | Card Name
C18·37 | Aminatou, the Fateshifter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: +1：抓一张牌，然后将一张牌从你手上置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: C18·37 | Aminatou, the Fateshifter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−1]: Exile another target permanent you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: −1：放逐另一个目标由你拥有的永久物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: C18·37 | Aminatou, the Fateshifter | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−6]: Choose left or right. Each player gains control of all nonland permanents other than CARDNAME controlled by the next player in the chosen direction.
trans-unit.target: −6：选择左边或右边。每位牌手各获得由所选方向之下一位牌手操控的所有非地永久物之操控权，但CARDNAME除外。

trans-unit.resname: C18·37 | Aminatou, the Fateshifter | Card Text | Paragraph 4
C18·38 | Arixmethes, Slumbering Isle | Card Name
C18·38 | Arixmethes, Slumbering Isle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped with five slumber counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场，且上面有五个静眠指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·38 | Arixmethes, Slumbering Isle | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as Arixmethes has a slumber counter on it, it's a land. (It's not a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 只要阿力马昔斯上有静眠指示物，它便是地。（它不是生物。）

trans-unit.resname: C18·38 | Arixmethes, Slumbering Isle | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, you may remove a slumber counter from Arixmethes.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，你可以从阿力马昔斯上移去一个静眠指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·38 | Arixmethes, Slumbering Isle | Card Text | Paragraph 4
C18·39 | Brudiclad, Telchor Engineer | Card Name
C18·39 | Brudiclad, Telchor Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature tokens you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的衍生生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: C18·39 | Brudiclad, Telchor Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 blue Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token. Then you may choose a token you control. If you do, each other token you control becomes a copy of that token.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，派出一个2/1蓝色非瑞人／秘耳衍生神器生物。然后你可以选择一个由你操控的衍生物。若你如此作，则每个由你操控的其他衍生物均成为该衍生物的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: C18·43 | Lord Windgrace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card.

trans-unit.source: [−11]: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk.

trans-unit.resname: C18·48 | Varina, Lich Queen | Card Name
C18·48 | Varina, Lich Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack with one or more Zombies, draw that many cards, then discard that many cards. You gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你以一个或数个灵俑攻击时，抓等量的牌，然后弃掉等量的牌。你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: C18·48 | Varina, Lich Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: {2}，从你的坟墓场放逐两张牌：派出一个已横置的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·49 | Windgrace's Judgment | Card Name
C18·49 | Windgrace's Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For any number of opponents, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 为任意数量的对手各进行以下流程～消灭目标由该牌手操控的非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·50 | Xantcha, Sleeper Agent | Card Name
C18·50 | Xantcha, Sleeper Agent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一位对手。珊迦在该牌手的操控下进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C18·50 | Xantcha, Sleeper Agent | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Xantcha attacks each combat if able and can't attack its owner or planeswalkers its owner controls.
trans-unit.target: 珊迦每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击；且珊迦不能攻击其拥有者或由其拥有者操控的鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: C18·50 | Xantcha, Sleeper Agent | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}: Xantcha's controller loses 2 life and you draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.
trans-unit.target: {3}：珊迦的操控者失去2点生命且你抓一张牌。任何牌手均可以起动此异能。

trans-unit.resname: C18·51 | Yennett, Cryptic Sovereign | Card Name
C18·51 | Yennett, Cryptic Sovereign | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·51 | Yennett, Cryptic Sovereign | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, reveal the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if its mana value is odd. If you don't cast it, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，展示你的牌库顶牌。如果它的法术力值为奇数，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未施放它，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C18·52 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Name
C18·52 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 指挥官忍术{U}{B}（{U}{B}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物回手：将此牌从你手上或统帅区横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: C18·52 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的忍者对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。每位对手各失去等同于该牌法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: C18·53 | Ancient Stone Idol | Card Name
C18·53 | Ancient Stone Idol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·53 | Ancient Stone Idol | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 每有一个进行攻击的生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: C18·53 | Ancient Stone Idol | Card Text | Paragraph 3
C18·53 | Ancient Stone Idol | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 6/12 colorless Construct artifact creature token with trample.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个6/12无色，具践踏异能的组构体衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: C18·54 | Coveted Jewel | Card Name
C18·54 | Coveted Jewel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw three cards.

trans-unit.resname: C18·54 | Coveted Jewel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add three mana of any one color.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加三点任意颜色的单色法术力。

trans-unit.resname: C18·54 | Coveted Jewel | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of CARDNAME. Untap it.
trans-unit.target: 每当由对手操控的一个或数个生物攻击你且未受阻挡时，该牌手抓三张牌并获得CARDNAME的操控权。将它重置。

trans-unit.resname: C18·55 | Endless Atlas | Card Name
C18·55 | Endless Atlas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control three or more lands with the same name.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：抓一张牌。只能于你操控三个或更多具相同名称的地时起动。

trans-unit.resname: C18·56 | Geode Golem | Card Name
C18·56 | Geode Golem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C18·56 | Geode Golem | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may cast your commander from the command zone without paying its mana cost. (You still pay any additional costs.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以从统帅区施放你的指挥官，且不需支付其法术力费用。（你依旧要支付额外费用。）
